attributes.additional_details:
In resent years, the youth have got out of hand, drug running, gangs and many more disordely acts.
They can gain vital training  and gain skills to help get a job when they get out. They will learn respect and discipline
attributes.background: The youth of today needs direction

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306432
